summary: A tragic social drama set in post war Japan and concerns a lonely woman trying to find purpose and stability in a devastated Tokyo.
cast: Hideko Takamine|Masayuki Mori|Mariko Okada|Isao Yamagata|Chieko Nakakita|Daisuke Katô|Mayuri Mokushô|Noriko Sengoku|Fuyuki Murakami|Heihachirô Ôkawa|Nobuo Kaneko|Roy James|Kan Hayashi|Akira Tani|Seijirô Onda|Keiko Mori|Tsuruko Mano|Kumeko Otowa|Teruko Mita|Toshiko Nakano|Kazuyo Mochida|Yaeko Izumo|Akira Sera|Yasuhisa Tsutsumi|Ichirô Tetsu|Masako Ôshiro|Sadako Kimura|Hideko Ebata|Michiko Kawa|Sumiyo Kadono|Toshiyasu Hiyoshi|Haruna Kaburagi|Gorô Sakurai
title: Nubes flotantes
